name: Tanks ALot
description:
Tanks ALot

This is an multiplayer game where you can create and join rooms and enjoy the game. It is currently a low pick BattleRoyale. 

This is an multiplayer game which can be played on the android devices supported from android version 4 to 11.  Since this an demo version it will receive updates and later it will be played with pc in the same game. 

So good luck and enjoy and please don't forget to share your feedback.
